attributes.review: I downloaded and opened the app and the first picture was Donald Trump in a two-piece, neon green bikini. His hands looked so small, it scared me so much that I still have nightmares. I will be seeking therapy. The app gave details on how Trump achieves his orange skin color through a 8 day process of submerging himself in spaghetti sauce and ketchup. It made me nauseous. The only nice part was he finally explained he achieves the gross-wig-thin-spiderweb-hair look by collecting dust from the floor each night and creating a toupee. I tried to delete the app and Russian bots hacked all of my information. Do Not Download!!!!!!!!!!!!!
